job_tasks.phrase: Create and improve autonomous support platforms using LLMs.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the development and enhancement of platforms that utilize Large Language Models (LLMs), which falls under the core definition of Model Development & Fine-Tuning for GenAI.

job_tasks.phrase: This includes not only development but also troubleshooting, maintaining, and updating tools based on user feedback and support tickets.
job_tasks.justification: This describes traditional software engineering tasks such as troubleshooting, maintenance, and updating tools, which are part of the Software Development & Integration category.

job_tasks.phrase: One example would be creating an assistant able to guide customers through an upgrade process.
job_tasks.justification: Creating an assistant that guides users implies designing interactions and potentially prompts for an LLM, aligning with the Prompt Engineering aspect of this category.

job_tasks.phrase: Test and integrate state-of-the-art AI technologies, like GPT-4 Vision and Amazon CodeWhisperer
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions testing and integrating specific LLMs (GPT-4 Vision) and AI coding assistants (Amazon CodeWhisperer), which are classified under LLM/Generative Models.

job_tasks.phrase: providing support and guidance for internal teams on how to best utilize these technologies within their workflows.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves supporting and guiding internal teams on technology utilization, which is a form of integration and knowledge transfer within a software development context.

job_tasks.phrase: Evaluate and enhance the performance and integration of AI solutions across different infrastructures, notably AWS
job_tasks.justification: Evaluating and enhancing performance and integration across infrastructures (like AWS) points towards operational aspects and ensuring the AI solutions work effectively in a production environment, fitting into Operations & MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: ensures support is available for end-users experiencing issues, focusing on maintaining high service quality and satisfaction.
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring support for end-users and maintaining service quality are core software development and integration responsibilities, focusing on the user-facing aspects of the deployed solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Improve support for both internal and external clients, significantly boosting the company's innovation capacity and service quality
job_tasks.justification: This phrase focuses on improving client support and boosting company innovation and service quality, which relates to understanding business needs and strategic goals.

soft_skills.phrase: providing support and guidance for internal teams on how to best utilize these technologies within their workflows.

profile.rationale: The job ad describes tasks that involve creating and improving platforms using LLMs (1.B.1, 1.B.2), integrating specific GenAI technologies like GPT-4 Vision and Amazon CodeWhisperer (2.3), and working with cloud infrastructure (AWS). It also includes core software engineering tasks like troubleshooting, maintenance, and supporting internal teams (1.A.1). The focus is clearly on Generative AI, with a good balance between AI specialization and software engineering practices. Therefore, 'Core GenAI Engineer' is the most fitting profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines responsibilities related to LLMs and AI technologies, as well as software development and integration tasks. The mention of specific tools like GPT-4 Vision and AWS provides good detail. However, some phrases are slightly less explicit, and the overall description could be more detailed to reach a perfect score.
